layman_description: A brown variant mailbox for player base customization.

layman_description: A scattered pile of medical supplies and first aid items on the ground.
technical_description: Base medical loot pile with trash material, ground alignment, and medicalPileSmall loot table.
player_impact: Looting medical piles yields bandages, healing items, and pain medication for survival.

layman_description: A corner-positioned pile of medical supplies at room intersections.
technical_description: Extends cntMedicLootPileA with triangle item type icon for corner placement distinction.
player_impact: Corner medical piles provide medical items in strategic building locations.

layman_description: A larger scattered pile of medical supplies and equipment.
technical_description: Extends cntMedicLootPileA with larger loot table medicalPileMedium for increased items.
player_impact: Medium medical piles contain more abundant healing supplies and pharmaceutical items.

layman_description: A locked wall-mounted medicine cabinet in bathrooms and clinics.
technical_description: Extends cntMedicineCabinetOpen with Loot class and functional downgrade to open state.
player_impact: Breaking into medicine cabinets yields prescription medications and healthcare products.

layman_description: A development tool for testing medicine cabinet loot distributions.
technical_description: Extends cntMedicineCabinetClosed with dev properties and helper tint for loot balancing.
player_impact: This ensures medicine cabinets distribute medical items fairly across the game.

layman_description: A closed bathroom medicine cabinet with integrated sink faucet.
technical_description: Extends cntMedicineCabinetFaucetOpen with Loot class and downgrade to open state.
player_impact: These combo fixtures yield both medications and occasional plumbing supply items.

layman_description: An open bathroom vanity with medicine cabinet and faucet visible.
technical_description: Glass material base container with permitted water flow and inverted placement support.
player_impact: Open medicine cabinet sinks display their contents and sometimes contain water-related items.

layman_description: A testing utility for faucet-mounted medicine cabinet loot balance.
technical_description: Extends cntMedicineCabinetFaucetClosed with dev properties for loot table testing.
player_impact: Ensures faucet medicine cabinets provide balanced medication and supply distribution.

layman_description: An open wall-mounted medicine cabinet with contents exposed.
technical_description: Glass material container with water flow permitted and inverted placement orientation.
player_impact: Already-open medicine cabinets display their pharmaceutical contents immediately.

layman_description: A standard microwave oven with door closed and locked.
technical_description: Extends cntMicrowaveOvenVer1Open with Loot class and downgrade mechanic to open state.
player_impact: Breaking into microwaves yields food items, cooking ingredients, and occasional valuables.

layman_description: A player-placeable closed microwave oven for bases.
technical_description: Extends cntMicrowaveOvenVer1Closed with player placement and resource requirements.
player_impact: Decorate your player bases with functional-looking microwave ovens.

layman_description: A microwave oven with open door showing interior chamber.
technical_description: Metal construction container with permitted water flow and forward-facing placement.
player_impact: Open microwaves let you quickly see and grab contained food items.

layman_description: An alternate model microwave with closed door and sealed appearance.
technical_description: Extends cntMicrowaveOvenVer1Open as version 2 variant with Loot class enabled.
player_impact: Version 2 microwaves provide variety in kitchen loot environments.

layman_description: A player-placeable alternate microwave model for base building.
technical_description: Extends cntMicrowaveOvenVer2Closed with player placement options and resource values.
player_impact: Use version 2 microwaves to create diverse kitchen aesthetics in player bases.

layman_description: An open version 2 microwave showing interior storage space.
technical_description: Extends cntMicrowaveOvenVer1Open as version 2 variant for model diversity.
player_impact: Open version 2 microwaves display contents for quick food item access.

layman_description: A development tool for testing microwave loot distributions.
technical_description: Extends cntMicrowaveOvenVer2Closed with dev icon tint for testing loot tables.
player_impact: Ensures microwave ovens provide balanced food and cooking item rewards.
